masani

(but people at the passport control know me as Mohammad Hossein Amani)

Ph.D. student in Computer Science @ EPFL, Switzerland

GitHub | Google Scholar | CV | Email

Hello friend, Since September 2022, I have been a Ph.D. student at EPFL, studying symbolic representation learning, reinforcement learning, and sequence-to-sequence modeling.

Before starting my Ph.D., I spent time at SPOC, IST Austria, and CUHK, where I studied more mathematically themed problems in machine learning.

Outside of work, I like cycling, reading, peanut butter, genuine conversations, indie music, dogs, running, steadfastness, climbing, the earthy smell after rain, wholesome vegetarian food, embarking on adventures, and coffee.

I sometimes take photos of things I find interesting. You can check them out on Instagram or Unsplash.
